channel.title: What is your favorite skill?
channel.description:
So, I'm surprised this hasn't been posted before. I am wondering, what is your favorite skill and why?
Some examples - WC because it's an easy AFK and makes money Agility because I can go to new places Ranged so I can safe spot hard bosses
Mine are - 1. Magic - I love the teleports and high magic spells. I also love the multi-hit ancients spells. Current level - 75 2. Construction - I host house parties pretty frequently. I love to train prayer at my Gilded altar, my magic at my Gilded Lecturn. And PVP in my dungeon. Current level - 75 (if you include the bonuses I always use; +3 from saw and +2 from tea; actual level 70) 3. Slayer - I just recently started slayer but I really enjoy it. Training combat and another skill at the same time is great. Current level - 42

item.title: What is your favorite skill?
item.dc:creator: @Tension_Ltd Tension Ltd
item.description:
@Tension_Ltd wrote:

Mine are …
1.) Melee - Because i can attack monsters and hit a lot and it’s fun.
2.) Slayer - Because at lvl 80 abbysal demons that drop whips and at lvl
90 dark beasts that drop d bows
3.) COnstruction - You get to build a house and an altar and everything so it’s pretty cool

Ty - Zero

item.title: What is your favorite skill?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:26, topic:354176”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=450465.msg3304618#msg3304618 date=1281567993]

Yea, I want more exp for the bonecrusher.

I have to complete about 3 more 5:5 Large dungeons for the bonecrusher. Haven’t really gotten around to it since I missed a Spectral Sigil drop yesterday and have a ton of lootshare points to burn off.
[/quote]Ouch, what was the average split?[/quote]

I wasn’t coinsharing, however since it was a mass I would think around 5M lootshare potential. Not much, but it’s a better chance than a lot of other people at a good drop, and I have to use it because it decreases by 10% every 24 hours. I’ve made around 2.5-3m in the past 2 days so it’s dying down.

Read full topic

item.title: What is your favorite skill?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“im hard, post:21, topic:354176”]Clue scrolls.

So attack,str, def range or Mage?

99 Mage btw.[/quote]Clue scrolls are more like an activity, not a skill.

[quote=“n10si t, post:20, topic:354176”]My cousin used to work for that old law runecrafting company and he was loaded lol[/quote]Lucky! I wasn’t a member at the time (I only started being a member like 6 months ago) and my RC level wasn’t high enough.

[quote=“Chassy13, post:23, topic:354176”]Fishing - Always have, always will. Saves tons of money on food for killing monsters since I fish all of my own food and don’t burn any with 99 cooking as well.

Slayer - Great money, doesn’t get boring because of the variety of drops and monsters to kill. This could pass Fishing on some days.

Dungeoneering - Although boring solo, with a good team you can have fun and the rewards are extremely useful.[/quote]If my fishing was higher, I probably wouldn’t feel like it was useless. But I cook everything I fish (which is why both of my skills are the same lvl :P)

Yea, I just started slayer and it’s one of my favorites already

Yea, I want more exp for the bonecrusher.

Read full topic

item.title: What is your favorite skill?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Fishing - Always have, always will. Saves tons of money on food for killing monsters since I fish all of my own food and don’t burn any with 99 cooking as well.

Slayer - Great money, doesn’t get boring because of the variety of drops and monsters to kill. This could pass Fishing on some days.

Dungeoneering - Although boring solo, with a good team you can have fun and the rewards are extremely useful.

Read full topic

Mine are:

[ul][li]Minning - Hell, I make 400-500k easy a day because of this one, how can I not love it?[/li]
[li]Smithing - Great cash, plus I have a small business that almost died after trade limits were added, we are pulling it back together though :)[/li]
[li]Runecrafting - Saved me around 5m so far, so its gotta be listed :)[/li][/ul]

[/quote]#2 - Yea, I used to work for a mining/smithing company. I was making about 2m a day, because they had clients that bought for a lot extra for bulk.[/quote]

My cousin used to work for that old law runecrafting company and he was loaded lol

item.title: What is your favorite skill?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Motokid126, post:14, topic:354176”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=450465.msg3304403#msg3304403 date=1281557680]

[quote author=Motokid126 link=topic=450465.msg3304388#msg3304388 date=1281557361]
Smiting-Always loved it since i started rs =)
Mining-Yet again, loved it since i started its just kinda fun in a way
Cons-I love building my house and making my own design, i’ve destroyed my house and re built it about 5 times, i just find it alot of fun.

Also, I really like summoning as well. I like being able to summon alot of different monsters.
[/quote]My house is the max number of rooms. I had removed about half of them at one time, so that I could build my dungeon (and have it be more than 1 room)

Slayer, dungeoneering.
[/quote]Dungeoneering sucks unless it’s with some friends.

Awesome, yeah i think i’ve got max number, whatever it is at 70 cons id love to get 99 but it cost to much lol.

And yeah I hate dung, thats why mines 20 something =p[/quote]Yea, I love construction. We are the same level o.O Do you have the gilded altar?
